data.title: Selvaag Bolig ASA to Announce Q4 2024 Financial Results
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest update is out from Selvaag Bolig ASA ( (GB:0Q92) ).

Selvaag Bolig ASA announced the upcoming release of their fourth quarter 2024 results, which will be published on February 12, 2025. The results will be presented by CEO Sverre Molvik and CFO Christopher Brunvoll at Hotel Continental in Oslo, with a live webcast available for remote attendees. The presentation will be held in Norwegian, with an English transcript provided afterward, offering stakeholders a comprehensive understanding of the company’s financial standing and future outlook.

More about Selvaag Bolig ASA

Selvaag Bolig ASA is a residential development company managing the full value chain from land acquisition to completed residential and urban areas. With a history spanning 75 years, the company is actively developing several thousand homes in growth regions around major cities in Norway and Sweden. Selvaag Bolig offers a diverse range of housing options, including their Selvaag Pluss® lifestyle concept, which integrates shared spaces and services.

YTD Price Performance: -1.12%

Average Trading Volume: 1,732

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell

Current Market Cap: NOK3.27B

data.description:

An update from Banco Santander ( (ES:SAN) ) is now available.

Banco Santander’s latest financial presentation for 2024 includes non-IFRS financial indicators and alternative performance measures to provide insights into its operational performance. These metrics, alongside non-financial information, are presented to aid management and investors in evaluating performance but are not intended to replace standard IFRS measures. The use of these indicators is crucial for understanding the company’s performance over different periods and across different geographic segments, although the measures may differ from those of its subsidiaries, affecting comparability.

More about Banco Santander

Banco Santander is a financial institution operating in the banking sector. It provides a range of financial services including retail banking, commercial banking, and asset management, primarily focusing on serving customers in various geographic segments.

Megaport Ltd. ( (AU:MP1) ) has provided an announcement.

Megaport Ltd. announced the issuance of 75,000 fully paid ordinary shares to be quoted on the ASX, effective February 5, 2025. data.title: Marmota Limited Updates AGM Presentation and Announces Enhanced Exploration Results
data.description:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Marmota Limited ( (AU:MEU) ) has issued an announcement.

Marmota Limited has made amendments to its AGM presentation following a request from the ASX. Key changes include the addition of a table referencing ASX announcements for bonanza gold grades and the removal of certain slides and exploration targets. A Competent Person statement was updated to note an employee’s involvement. Since the AGM, Marmota reported significantly higher gold assay results and released new titanium exploration findings, indicating a strong advancement in their mineral exploration activities. These updates suggest a positive trajectory for Marmota’s operations, potentially impacting their market position and stakeholder interests.

data.title: Equinor Initiates USD 1.2 Billion Share Buy-back Tranche for 2025
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Equinor ASA ( (GB:0M2Z) ) just unveiled an update.

Equinor ASA has announced the commencement of the first tranche of its 2025 share buy-back program, valued at up to USD 1.2 billion, which is part of a larger USD 5 billion buy-back initiative for 2025. This program aims to reduce the company’s issued share capital and involves structured repurchases of shares, including those held by the Norwegian State, which will maintain its ownership percentage. The buy-back is influenced by market conditions and is subject to board and shareholder approvals, reflecting Equinor’s strategic focus on shareholder returns and market stability.

More about Equinor ASA

Equinor ASA is a leading energy company primarily focused on the development and production of oil, gas, and renewable energy sources. The company operates globally and is committed to transitioning towards more sustainable energy solutions, maintaining a strong market presence particularly in Europe.

data.description:

An announcement from Magontec Limited ( (AU:MGL) ) is now available.

Magontec Limited announced the cessation of Xing Cai Li as a director effective from February 5, 2025. This development signifies a change in the company’s board composition, which may impact its strategic direction and governance, although the director held no securities or relevant interests within the company at the time of departure.

More about Magontec Limited

Magontec Limited operates in the manufacturing industry, focusing on the production and supply of magnesium alloys and cathodic corrosion protection products. The company aims to serve various market segments that require specialized metal solutions, particularly in the automotive and water heater industries.
